manifest.name: @typescript-eslint/type-utils
manifest.description: Type utilities for working with TypeScript + ESLint together
manifest.readme:
Type utils for ESLint Plugins

Type utilities for working with TypeScript within ESLint rules.

This utilities in this package are separated from `@typescript-eslint/utils` so that that package does not require a dependency on `typescript`. ## Contributing [See the contributing guide here](../../CONTRIBUTING.md)
